Question: ChefPaw CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ChefPaw

ChefPaw CES 2024

- Cooks & Prepares 6+ lbs of Food in 40 mins
- ChefPaw App for personalized dog nutrition
- Choose from 20+ free dog food recipes
- Fresh pet food maker with 25+ nutritional recipes
- Nutritional analyzer and suggested recipes
- Portion guidelines and storage recommendations
- Patent pending dog food maker with digestive-supporting ingredients
- User-friendly machine and app with detailed nutritional breakdown
- Free access to premium app features
- Backed by a two-year warranty
- Simplifies meal preparation, saves time, and ensures balanced meals
- Cost-effective and customizable recipes
- Allows for easy creation and management of pet profiles
- Available for $639 plus tax and shipping
Summary_cn:
狗厨师

狗厨师 CES 2024

- 在40分钟内烹饪和准备6磅以上的食物
- 狗厨师应用程序提供个性化的狗狗营养
- 可选择20多个免费狗粮食谱
- 拥有25多个营养食谱的新鲜宠物食物制造商
- 营养分析仪和推荐食谱
- 份量指南和储存建议
- 专利待定的狗狗食物制造商含有辅助消化的成分
- 用户友好的机器和应用程序，提供详细的营养分析
- 免费使用高级应用程序功能
- 两年保修支持
- 简化餐食准备，节省时间，确保均衡饮食
- 成本效益高，可定制的食谱
- 可轻松创建和管理宠物档案
- 售价639美元加税和运费
